vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
λέντιον, τό,
= Latin linteum, cloth, napkin, towel, [NT+2nd c.AD+]:—hence λεντι-άριος, ὁ, probably attendant at the bath, [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
towel, likely made of linen
a coarse cloth, with which servants were girded, a towel, napkin, apron, Jn. 13:4, 5*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 亞麻布製的衣服, 毛巾 (約 13:4, 13:5)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 亚麻布制的衣服, 毛巾 (约 13:4, 13:5)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: chiếc khăn; khăn quấn; một khăn trải vải. Nguồn gốc La-tinh
